text_ruling:
Once triggered, IT Department results in a constant ability that
continually tracks how many power counters are on the card. [Official FAQ]

IT Department always gives a piece of ice +1 strength due to the
token spent to activate the card ability, even if there are no other
counters left on the card or IT Department is no longer installed.

*Example: There are 5 tokens on IT Department. If the Corp
spends 1 token, the ice has +5 strength (1 for the initial token
+ 4 for the token still on IT Department). If the Corp spends
another token, now the ice has +8 strength (2 for the initial
tokens + 3 for each of the two instances of the ability). If the
Corp spent a third token, now the ice has only +9 strength (3
for the initial tokens + 2 for each of the three instances of the
ability).* [Official FAQ]
